summary: Chat application with simple display name login (no profile photo upload), public and private messaging, contact management, and support for sending text, audio, files, images, and videos with editing and deletion capabilities. File upload limit: 50MB per file.
architectural_notes: No authentication system - users enter with display name only
File storage on Internet Computer with 50MB per file limit
Support for multiple media types: text, audio, images, videos, files
Both public chat room and private one-on-one messaging

existing_features.title: Remove the profile picture upload component from the login/profile setup flow in LoginPage.tsx
Update the user profile mutation hook to send null or empty string for profilePicture when creating profiles

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove profile photo upload capability from login screen
Simple login with display name only (no authentication)
Contact management: create contacts and rename contacts
Send text, audio, files, images, and videos with 50MB file size limit
Edit and delete sent messages and files
Update the backend createProfile method to accept only displayName without requiring profilePicture
